data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SURINAME cruise from Texel to Suriname started at 1760-12-08
Ship: Suriname, Voyage: Texel - Suriname, 1st Observer: J.W. Pichot (Journaalhouder), 2nd Observer: C. Spruijt (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
